goals.description: Steal confidential case documents and privileged materials that users have uploaded to the platform for later use or sale.
Manipulate the LLM's tool calls to tag evidence inaccurately or to generate misleading discovery requests that favor the attacker’s legal position.
Bypass the underlying LLM's safety filters to produce unlawful or deceptive legal content, such as fabricated case‑law citations or false affidavits.
Overwhelm the system with massive or malformed ingest_document requests, exhausting compute resources and preventing legitimate users from accessing the service.
Extract the internal system prompts and instructions that guide the assistant’s behavior, enabling attackers to replicate or subvert the model’s safeguards.
Abuse the export_results tool to create and download forged legal documents that appear to be official outputs of the platform.
